sn12.83:1.1: “Jātiṁ, bhikkhave, ajānatā apassatā yathābhūtaṁ …pe…. 354
sn12.84:1.1: “Bhavaṁ, bhikkhave, ajānatā apassatā yathābhūtaṁ …pe…. 355
sn12.85:1.1: “Upādānaṁ, bhikkhave, ajānatā apassatā yathābhūtaṁ …pe…. 356
sn12.86:1.1: “Taṇhaṁ, bhikkhave, ajānatā apassatā yathābhūtaṁ …pe…. 357
sn12.87:1.1: “Vedanaṁ, bhikkhave, ajānatā apassatā yathābhūtaṁ …pe…. 358
sn12.88:1.1: “Phassaṁ, bhikkhave, ajānatā apassatā yathābhūtaṁ …pe…. 359
sn12.89:1.1: “Saḷāyatanaṁ, bhikkhave, ajānatā apassatā yathābhūtaṁ …pe…. 360
sn12.90:1.1: “Nāmarūpaṁ, bhikkhave, ajānatā apassatā yathābhūtaṁ …pe…. 361
sn12.91:1.1: “Viññāṇaṁ, bhikkhave, ajānatā apassatā yathābhūtaṁ …pe…. 362
sn12.92:1.1: “Saṅkhāre, bhikkhave, ajānatā apassatā yathābhūtaṁ saṅkhāresu yathābhūtaṁ ñāṇāya satthā pariyesitabbo;
sn12.92:1.2: saṅkhārasamudayaṁ ajānatā apassatā yathābhūtaṁ saṅkhārasamudaye yathābhūtaṁ ñāṇāya satthā pariyesitabbo;
sn12.92:1.3: saṅkhāranirodhaṁ ajānatā apassatā yathābhūtaṁ saṅkhāranirodhe yathābhūtaṁ ñāṇāya satthā pariyesitabbo;
sn12.92:1.4: saṅkhāranirodhagāminiṁ paṭipadaṁ ajānatā apassatā yathābhūtaṁ saṅkhāranirodhagāminiyā paṭipadāya yathābhūtaṁ ñāṇāya satthā pariyesitabbo”ti. 363
